title: What is the future of e-learning software technology in education? - Quora

response.answer_text: E-learning is here to stay. As computer ownership grows across the globe e-learning becomes increasingly viable and accessible. Internet connection speeds are increasing, and with that, opportunities for more multimedia training methods arise. How will technology influence education in the future? According to the weekly essay, education will experience massive changes in the future because of tech advancements. Teachers will have access to technology that will enable them to teach effectively. Students will also have access to technology that would make learning more effective too.  Please follow me!
